syllabus:
Commercial Space Design II  
  
**Course introduction**

This course focuses on the practices of planning, meeting functional requirements, developing design concept, articulating client’s needs, and creating interior design. Students will develop a detailed understanding of commercial interior design and gain the abilities to integrate ergonomic needs, transform design thinking, and execute proposals.   
  
**Course goals**

*   Acknowledge the advance knowledge in commercial interior space 
*   Establish the skill of developing design concept   
*   Articulate the client’s needs and investigate branding 
*   Develop the skill of designing commercial interior space 

  
**Course theme**  
This class introduces the fundamental knowledge in commercial space design, such as display system, lighting design, graphic design, branding, and spatial design. Students expect to develop two commercial space design based on the requirement.   
  
**Course assignments**  
(1) TSID Comeptition  
(2) Detail of display system  
 

**Weekly schedule and contents**  
Week 01: Introduction  
Week 02: TSID comeptition requirement and understanding  
Week 03: Team division and discussion on project concept  
Week 04: Team discussion on project program  
Week 05: Team development of project circulation  
Week 06: Team development of project space  
Week 07: Team development of project space  
Week 08: TSID project presentation  
Week 09: Assignment II: Detail design of display system  
Week 10: Lecture on display system  
Week 11: Case studies  
Week 12: Design development  
Week 13: Detail development  
Week 14: Mock-up development  
Week 15: Mock-up modification  
Week 16: Final Presentation

methodologies.note: Ability of finding discussion topics and references
Design observation, collecting references, and design ability
Ability of working with teammate to develop project
Design sketches, drawing, and presentation ability
